          <title>
            <string language="en">The glass and air interface</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Glas- und Luftschnittstelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'interface en verre et d'air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A relação do vidro e do ar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'interfaccia dell'aria e di vetro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η διαπροσωπεία γυαλιού και αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El interfaz del cristal y del aire</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that light is refracted as it passes from glass through air.  This can be used in a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">angle of incidence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">angle of refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light ray</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß Licht refracted, 
während es vom Glas durch Luft überschreitet. Dieses kann in 
einer beschriftenden Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme prouve que la lumière est 
réfractée pendant qu'elle passe du verre par l'air. Ceci
peut être utilisé dans un exercice étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que a luz refracted enquanto 
passa do vidro através do ar. Isto pode ser usado em um 
exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che la luce refracted mentre 
passa da vetro attraverso aria. Ciò può essere usata in 
un'esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι το φως διαθλιέται 
καθώς περνά από το γυαλί μέσω του αέρα. Αυτό μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que la luz está refractada 
mientras que pasa del cristal a través del aire. Esto se puede 
utilizar en un ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
